hero.title: Automate your processes, boost your business
hero.subtitle: We transform your manual and repetitive tasks into agile and efficient automated systems, freeing up your team to focus on what really matters: growing.

services.title: Our Automation Solutions
services.subtitle: We offer a comprehensive suite of automation services to meet your unique needs.

service1.title: Automatic Time Tracking
service1.description: Each employee clocks in from a link or QR. Generates reports by location, date, and team without a single spreadsheet.

service2.title: Automatic File Sorting
service2.description: Your documents are organized by date, client, or type. Automatic backups to disk or cloud without lifting a finger.

service3.title: Digital Internal Requests
service3.description: A digital form for supplies, transfers, support, or whatever you need. Replaces email, WhatsApp, or paper.

service1.title: Data Capture from WhatsApp/Social
service1.description: We automatically extract what your customers write (name, order, address) and save it in an organized table.

service2.title: Digital Sales/Service Log
service2.description: From a phone or tablet, record every sale or service provided. Centralized data instantly for daily or weekly reports.

service3.title: Frequent Customer Follow-up
service3.description: Receive alerts for customers who haven't returned. Send reminders, promotions, or personalized messages automatically.

service1.title: Automatic KPI Calculation
service1.description: Total sales, best-selling products, profits, visits. Ready daily or weekly without formulas or emails, delivered in Excel or PDF.

service2.title: Automatic Expense/Performance Report
service2.description: You upload your data (expenses, income, operations) and the system does everything. Clear balances, percentages, and summaries.

service3.title: Weekly Activity Consolidation
service3.description: Each area records its achievements → the system creates a visual report. It updates itself, every week.

service1.title: Automated Equipment Scanning
service1.description: Detect suspicious tasks, unauthorized software, or large files on Windows/Linux, and report to the tech team.
